      • addSongInPool

        public boolean addSongInPool(java.lang.String title,
                             java.lang.String artist,
                             java.lang.String releaseDate,
                             int duration,
                             int genre,
                             int user)
        Add song to the songs pool (songs array) pre: 1. The name of artist must be unique
        2. The title of the song must be unique per artirst post: 1. Returns true if the song was added successfully
        2. Returns false if the song couldn't be added
        Parameters:
        title - Song title
        artist - Song artist name
        releaseDate - Song release date
        duration - Song duration in seconds
        genre - Song genre that define the genre, only 1 per song
        user - User position in the users array that add the song
        Returns:
        added
